data.comment: The match is underway in Burnley.
In Burnley, Jay Rodriguez of Burnley is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Burnley Crystal Palace drive forward through Nathaniel Clyne. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 4, Jay Rodriguez for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Kevin Friend signals a Burnley throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 5, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Burnley.
In the minute 8, Goal! Chris Wood gives Burnley a 1-0 lead in Burnley.
Jay Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Burnley surge into the attack at Turf Moor but Chris Woodâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Turf Moor.
Free kick Burnley.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 21, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Michy Batshuayi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, Kevin Friend awards Burnley a goal kick.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
Kevin Friend signals a Burnley throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 33, Burnley to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Burnley.
Burnley are coming forward and Dwight McNeil gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 35, Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace pushes forward through Jordan Ayew, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andros Townsend of Crystal Palace smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 38, Throw-in high up the field for Crystal Palace in Burnley.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
In the minute 40, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Burnley, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 43, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 45, Eberechi Eze of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Burnley.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Chris Wood for Burnley drives towards goal at Turf Moor. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Michy Batshuayi of Crystal Palace is pulled up for offside.
Kevin Friend signals a Burnley throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Burnley.
Burnley apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Johann Gudmundsson. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Crystal Palace are pushing forward but Andros Townsend's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 57, Can Burnley capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Burnley have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Burnley close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Turf Moor.
Crystal Palace's Patrick Van Aanholt misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Crystal Palace drive forward but Patrick Van Aanholt is judged offside.
Important block from the Crystal Palace defence as Jay Rodriguez fires in a strike for Burnley.
In the minute 62, Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
Crystal Palace push forward at Turf Moor and Patrick Van Aanholt gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Burnley defence.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 65, Crystal Palace's Jairo Riedewald gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Burnley defender.
Patrick Van Aanholt for Crystal Palace gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
In the minute 66, Kevin Friend awards Burnley a goal kick.
Jeffrey Schlupp is on a sub for Jairo Riedewald for Crystal Palace.
Burnley make their first substitution with Robbie Brady replacing Johann Gudmundsson.
In the minute 68, Burnley have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Burnley's Chris Wood has run offside.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Burnley in the half of Crystal Palace.
Dwight McNeil (Burnley) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Chris Wood (Burnley) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Crystal Palace defenders.
In the minute 73, Throw-in high up the field for Crystal Palace in Burnley.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Burnley.
In the minute 75, Burnley's James Tarkowski goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
In the minute 77, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Christian Benteke is replacing Jordan Ayew for the away team.
Burnley have a goal kick.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
Jay Rodriguez (Burnley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 83, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Robbie Brady is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Erik Pieters (Burnley) has replaced the possibly injured Robbie Brady.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
In Burnley Crystal Palace attack through James McArthur. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Burnley's Matthew Lowton has been booked in Burnley.
In the minute 87, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Kevin Friend awards Burnley a goal kick.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Turf Moor.
In the minute 88, Burnley needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Burnley.
Crystal Palace drives forward and Christian Benteke gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kevin Friend signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Burnley's half.
Nick Pope returns to the field for Burnley after picking up a slight injury.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Burnley.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Burnley to check on Nick Pope, who is grimacing with pain.
